channel.title: Version 3.3 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 3.3.0 (2022-03-28) New New Introduction of new CSS variables to set the font. The theme distinguishes between --MAIN-font for all content text and --CODE-font for inline or block code. There are additional overrides for all headings. See the theme variant generator of the exampleSite for all available variables.
